title.rendered: PWAN-PRIME Investments and Properties LTD. Announces Plans to Launch a New Estate Located at Epe Local Government,  Lagos State.

<title>PWAN-Prime is set to launch a new estate in the city of Epe</title>
<meta name="description" content="PWAN-Prime is set to launch a new estate in the city of Epe, an area in the new Lagos. The estate is in close proximity to Ibeju Lekki." />
